subject: Baseball
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Suits and Litigation
Athletics and Sports
Judges
lead_paragraph: A judge presiding over a lawsuit said he would rule Friday whether to reveal the names of major league baseball players implicated in performance-enhancing drugs in government documents.
snippet: A judge presiding over a lawsuit said he would rule Friday whether to reveal the names of major league baseball players implicated in performance-enhancing drugs in government documents.
